      • Case

        public Case​(SourceLocation sourceLocation,
            Expression condition,
            Statement statement)
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - Location of the node within the containing source file.
        condition - The constant expression whose value is compared against the surrounding switch statement's test expression.
        statement - The statement that is executed if the condition is equal to the test expression's value.

        public int getCondition()
        Get the condition.
        Returns:
        The integer constant associated with this case.
        Throws:
        InternalCompilerError - if the condition expression has not been evaluated yet
